Name: Coffin
Description: A wooden mummiform coffin base, decorated inside. Only fragments of the lid remain, including the fine face mask. All decoration on the fragments of the lid has been obliterated, probably due to fire damage, but if the internal painting is an indication then it was once very beautifully worked. Inside are depictions of the deceased with text and the four Sons of Horus, the colours are still vivid (see images).There are still fragments of linen bandages in the bottom of the coffin.
